posts.post_content: I'm looking to add a showstopper piece to my collection.  It can be 19th century, or even newer.  If you have something you'd like to move that isn't listed for sale yet, please pm me or email me at [url]tanmanbaseballfan@gmail.com[/url] - thank you!
I've got a few Canseco cards.  I hear you're a fan.  :D

[quote name="Cmount76" post=2089671]I've got a few Canseco cards.  I hear you're a fan.  :D[/QUOTE]

Haha yes I am!  I'd love to hear if you have some rare stuff!
